title: A Dry Pelican
description: Pavid is an animal Investigator who hates animals. His most recent client is a vile woman who wants him to investigate the loss of her Dry Pelican. The simple mystery leads him to Fire Breath, a mysterious and dark creature of unknown purpose. A good friend, Imagio, follows him through the dangers of the outside world and an annoying caretaker, Invesia, intrudes in his investigation despite his demands that she leave him alone. Eventually, he discovers an affection for her that may be difficult for him to accept because of her love of animals. Good for young adult reading, containing scary themes, action/violence.
author: Eric John Ladwig
